website_summaries.verdict: A well-made and waterproof cover designed specifically for center console v-hull boats, although some may find the price a little high.
pros: Fits a variety of boats, from 16 feet to 26 feet (up to a 106-inch beam)
Designed for center console v-hull boats
Constructed of 600 denier polyester, with sewn-in long straps and buckles
Good for storage and trailer towing
cons: The price here is considerably more than other top covers
Some reports of ripping after a few months

customer_reviews.title: Fit my 25 perfectly!
customer_reviews.text: It fit my 25 foot boat perfectly! The only downside is that a puddle will form between the bow rails unless you add something underneath to keep it taller than the sides of the boat. The only downside I have is the lack of tiedowns on the back. It’s designed to be strapped under the boat and only side to side. I may add some rivets to bungee cord down the backside. I’m very happy with the materials and the overall size.
customer_reviews.author: Roland Deschain

customer_reviews.title: It fit perfect. I was amazed the it actually covered the ...
customer_reviews.text: I received this boat cover today for my 2017 Nauticstar 215 XTS. It fit perfect. I was amazed the it actually covered the motor (Yamaha 150hp.) too. I did not have to remove the trolling motor with this cover. I did place some foam pipe insulation over the blades for extra protection. The tie down straps are perfectly placed. For the price I don't think the more pricey covers could do any better.
customer_reviews.author: P. Coe

customer_reviews.title: Not Durable
customer_reviews.text: The Boat cover literally disintegrated one year after use. I purchased this cover which claimed to have a 4 year warranty and it is completely unusable. Apparently the sun caused the material to break down and began ripping in the middle. How can I claim the warranty?
customer_reviews.author: Linda

customer_reviews.title: Cover will do for now
customer_reviews.text: Cover seems ok. I got this for my 2007 Sea Ray 215 Weekender. Not the thickest quality, amazon did not have the 1200D available & needed something fast. The front looks like it will pool up with water. I don think this thing will hold up going down the highway at 60 mph. I little bit bigger & not as form fitting as id like, but it will do for now.
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Fits 225 sea hunt victory
customer_reviews.text: Easy to put on. Cover fit entire boat even with high bow rails. I went one size larger 22-24 due to my boat specs. Was able to cover entire 225 seahunt victory including engine (150 Yamaha). Can't comment on durability yet. Seems like a well advertised product. Would recommend protection top of windshield with a pool noodle to avoid tearing over time. Water ran off without center pole.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t work for me.
customer_reviews.text: Can’t get tight enough to keep rain from pooling inside the boat and the water still leaked thru the cover when it pooled. Have to put a chair under the cover to form a tent so the water will drain off. After 3 rain storms the cover ripped. The snaps wouldn’t stay so had to use Zip ties to hold them together....
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Kirkpatrick

customer_reviews.title: All good now, time will tell
customer_reviews.text: Seems fine, lots of straps which is nice. I can't speak to durability over time but I'm pleased so far. I have a 21.8 foot center console bay boat and it fits over the boat and outboard (barely). Ideally Im going to get an outboard cover and just have this cover the hull. Great price compared to others so it's a good buy in my opinion.
customer_reviews.author: MBooth

customer_reviews.title: High quality, nice fit on dual console Grady white 192... Extends beyond over engine, as desired.
customer_reviews.text: These are really high quality covers. I own two of them now. I bought one as the right proper fit for 'daily' summer use, after having first bought one in extreme oversized to use as a winter cover (under which I build a tall wood and PVCpipe frame), to batten down tightly and shed the feet of snow dropped through winter, in Boston). For each, I had waited and searched funding returned items, saving $ on nearly perfect items. Great covers. Holding up nicely so far. Fit was as described
customer_reviews.author: MeK

customer_reviews.title: Cover could use stern straps.
customer_reviews.text: I have had this cover on our center console boat for several months. I have PVC frame under it so it doesn't sag and accumulate water. It has held up well except for the stern/rear of the cover. It needs straps on the back. It keeps collecting water during heavy rains and caving in because it cannot be secured or pulled tight enough to keep water off. I am installing grommets for bungee cords to hopefully solve this problem.
customer_reviews.author: vicki

customer_reviews.title: Boat cover
customer_reviews.text: Nice cover that seems to be pretty durable. I will re-rate it after the winter
customer_reviews.author: Dennis B

customer_reviews.title: Quality material, fits a 23’ boat perfectly, good value
customer_reviews.text: Good quality boat cover. Covers a 23 foot center console (without t top) boat perfectly. Not super duty, but feels like a quality material that will last for at least a couple years. Perfect value for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Marzizo

customer_reviews.title: Nice cover !
customer_reviews.text: Fit our 21 ft center console bay boat quite well. Like that it came with all the straps which are quite long. No way is this cover going to blow off. The fabric is lightweight, easy to manage. Appears to be well made and so far very durable.
customer_reviews.author: Diane Blueglass

customer_reviews.title: Good fit
customer_reviews.text: Replaced the old cover for my Seahunt Ultra 196. Couple of Rubbermaid trash cans to prevent the rainwater from pooling and you’re good to go.
customer_reviews.author: Dale Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Very good product!!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this cover a year ago for my Xpress 21 bay. It’s holding up very well...easy to take on and off, doesn’t leak at all and “breathes” very well. For the money you can’t beat it...when this one is worn out I will absolutely buy another.
customer_reviews.author: Danny C

customer_reviews.title: Very easy assembly
customer_reviews.text: It’s not on quite straight but fits an 18’ deep V boat really well with extra room! Showed up a day early and was super easy to put on. Definitely a good deal for a universal boat cover. Couldn’t find any custom made covers because the boat is a well loved ‘72 and the previous owners used a tarp.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Good for 18 months.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this cover August 11, 2015 it worked very well until earlier this month when it tore. I gave it 3 stars because at least it lasted about 18 months. I will just have to buy another brand and see if it last as long if not longer.
customer_reviews.author: JUAN

customer_reviews.title: Holds up during a wet snowstorm!
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to put on or take off by yourself. Incredibly strong, it stayed on and tight all through a very late 4" new England spring snowstorm! I love it no problem whatsoever!
customer_reviews.author: James R. Gedenberg

customer_reviews.title: So far ok
customer_reviews.text: So far it’s doing well , but water pools in the back ,
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl Janata

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Yes the boat cover exceeded my expectations tremendously, fit almost perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: godschild

customer_reviews.title: good product
customer_reviews.text: Great cover, lots of straps, waterproof even when sagging for days.
customer_reviews.author: Mavrick

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Fit perfect in my 20' outrange boston whaler 1988. Highly recommended
customer_reviews.author: Juan Manuel Del Valle

customer_reviews.title: Great Cover, good price.
customer_reviews.text: Very good quality, wide beam, under-belly tie downs. I was looking at covers in the 400-600 dollar range. Glad I found this one and would recommend to anyone!
customer_reviews.author: robert carlson

customer_reviews.title: PROTECT THE TITANIC
customer_reviews.text: Cover fits the boat decent for a generic product. In my opinion the price seemed a bit high and the true test will be the SWFL sun. Will adjust the review once it has been tested through the summer month which is the ultimate test of monsoons rain storms and did I mention the sun.
customer_reviews.author: EXPEDITION

customer_reviews.title: Great product for the price
customer_reviews.text: Great product for the price. Comes with easy to use tie downs too. Fits our 20' center console well. Just put it on so we'll see how it holds up to the FL rainy season. But so far good with regard to quality, price, and ease of use.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Good enough
customer_reviews.text: Holds out the water, as I hoped. Fit was as expected, with a little extra room to spare. Good investment.
customer_reviews.author: DM

customer_reviews.title: True 600 Denier, Water Proof
customer_reviews.text: Best Boat cover I've ever owned. tough true 600 Denier and water proof.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Budge 600 Denier Boat Cover fits Center Console V-Hull Boats B-631-X7 (22' to 24' Long, Gray)
product_meta.description: Size:22'-24' Long (Beam Width Up to 106")The Budge Sportsman 600 Denier Boat Covers, B-631-X7 provides all weather protection for your Center Console V-Hull Boat. To provide superior protection to your boat, this cover provides ultimate marine grade protection. Waterproof to repel snow, hot sun and heavy rain, the 600 denier polyester material is UV treated for maximum sun and heat protection to protect your boat's upholstery and paint. A heavy duty shock cord hem gives the cover a semi-custom fit and top and bottom sewn-in straps and buckles make it exceptionally durable when trailering, so you can safely tow your boat to the shore. This boat cover fits center console V-Hull boats 22'-24' (264"-288"), beam width up to 106".
feature_bullets: MARINE GRADE PROTECTION: Waterproof to repel snow, hot sun and heavy rain, the 600 denier polyester material is UV treated for maximum sun and heat protection to protect your boat's upholstery and paint
WATERPROOF AND BREATHABLE: Material designed to prevent condensation build-up and reduce rust, mold and mildew

BUILT TO STAY SECURE: Heavy shock cord hem gives cover a semi-custom fit. Top and bottom strap system makes it exceptionally durable when trailering, so you can tow your boat to the shore without having to worry
SIZED TO FIT: Our custom-like design Budge 600 Denier Boat Cover fits Center Console V-Hull Boats. This boat cover fits Center Console V-Hull boats 22'-24' (264"-288"), beam width up to 106"

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.4 out of 5 stars68 ratings4.4 out of 5 stars
